getStyleDetailForDevice

public static byte getStyleDetailForDevice()
Returns the style detail recommended for the device.

Returns:
style detail recommended for the device.Possible values are:
SKMapViewStyle.STYLE_DETAIL_HIGH, SKMapViewStyle.STYLE_DETAIL_MEDIUM, SKMapViewStyle.STYLE_DETAIL_LOW
